title: Ticket #5352: HTCondor View: download data as CVS
description: HTCondor View should offer an interface to download the currently displayed table as CSV file. This will involve building a data URL on the fly. Potential reference: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3665115/create-a-file-in-memory-for-user-to-download-not-through-server
remarks:
2015-Oct-28 17:16:05 by adesmet:
I have the code to turn the data table into CSV. TODO:
  1. Turn into a data URL
  2. Use the correct data table! At the moment it's the raw data; we want the same data used for the table on screen. Will require either re-running, or caching the result somewhere.

2015-Nov-03 10:55:12 by adesmet:
Implemented. Works as desired on Firefox and Chrome. Safari doesn't respect the download attribute and insists on viewing it directly; clumsy, but you can save the resulting view. As best I can tell, there is no pure client-side Javascript solution.
creator: adesmet
